title: Bitcoin Sinks Below $10,000, Women ‘Disrupters’, Bailing Out of Bonds
itunes:title: Bitcoin Sinks Below $10,000, Women ‘Disrupters’, Bailing Out of Bonds
description:
Rob Urban, Bloomberg News Senior Financial Editor, and Camila Russo, Bloomberg News Crypto Currencies Reporter, discuss the continued rout in Bitcoin. Dr. Patti Fletcher, author of "Disrupters" shares success strategies for women in tech. Liz Capo McCormick, Bloomberg News Bond Reporter, explains why there could be a $500 billion bond exodus. We Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” on Wall Street and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
